data.text:
New York: Alfred A. Knopf, 1983.

Price: $20.00

Hardcover. First edition. Boards slightly flared, else near fine in very good dustwrapper with edges lightly worn, short tear with internal tape repair on top corner and spine ends.

Item #235264

ISBN: 0394529685

item image

Doris Lessing

birth name: Doris May Tayler

born: 10/22/1919

View Reference Info

Biography

British writer whose novels and short stories are largely concerned with people caught in the social and political upheavals of the 20th century. - Merriam-Webster's Encyclopedia of Literature

She was awarded the Nobel Prize for Literature in 2007 at age 87, beating out good old Theodore Mommsen (the 1902 winner) to become the oldest person to win the award.more
